string.value: As soon as I reach #b#m250010503##k, I can faintly hear a voice coming out of there...

Out of the blue, #rMaster Goblin#k decided to speak to me. Master Goblin seemed eager to dispell the rumors and misconceptions held towards him... is he for real?? I should head over to the #bRock Support of the Disappeared Statue#k at #bGoblin Forest 2#k as Master Goblin instructed.

Master Goblin reiterated he had no hard feelings towards Mu Lung, and that all this hatred stems from Do Gong, who's jealous of Master Goblin's mastery on spells. No way... I better talk to Master Goblin and find out myself.

Hey traveler~ I can tell you're from Do Gong, based on that hideous-looking item you are carrying. Throw that away, and just listen to what I have to say, okay? I will be more than happy to dispell the rumors surrounding me here. Please come... hohoho~

You have entered the deepest part of Goblin Forest... But if you go through the #bRock Support of the Disappeared Statue at the Second Goblin Forest#k, then it won't be as hard for you to enter. Please come to this area immediately. I will show you what I am really about, the King Sage Cats.
Are you declining my invitation? That's... too bad. I really wanted to dispell the rumors and be on good terms with Mu Lung once more...
Ohhh, you're here! You're HERE, traveler! Of course, justice shall prevail in the end! Hohohoho... now, I shall break down the 'gap' between you and me. Allow me to separate the truth from fiction.

What did Do Gong Say about this King Sage Cats? I am sure he mentioned something about me being a threat to Mu Lung and all. What I want you to know here, however, is that I have NOTHING against Mu Lung at all~ I mean, I am not human, but I also am a trained Master from Mu Lung. Why would I despise Mu Lung?
